parse.title: List of cultural icons of Germany

This list of cultural icons of Germany is a list of people and things from any period which are independently considered to be cultural icons characteristic of Germany. [1].

This is a dynamic list and may never be able to satisfy particular standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it with reliably sourced entries.

Contents

  • 2 Art

Art[edit]

Main article: German art

Artists[edit]

Wanderer above the Sea of Fog is an iconic painting of German Romanticism.
  • Reinhold Begas (1831-1911)
  • Otto Dix (1891-1969)
  • Albrecht Dürer (1471-1528)
  • Max Ernst (1891-1976)
  • Caspar David Friedrich (1774-1840)
  • Karl Friedrich Lessing (1808-1880)
  • Franz Marc (1880-1916)
  • Adolph Menzel (1815-1905)
  • Karl Friedrich Schinkel (1781-1841)
  • Andreas Schlüter (1659-1714)
  • Anton von Werner (1843-1915)

Tourist souvenirs of East Berlin Ampelmännchen.
